about_the_game:
Miryam is a ten-year-old girl. Her mother gave birth to a younger brother last year, and since then her life has been completely changed. "Miryam, go and make milk powder for your brother." "Miryam, bring me the diaper." "Miryam, can't you be quiet for a while and let your brother sleep peacefully?" The criticisms from her mother because of the brother fill her ears every day... "Sometimes, I really wish you hadn't been born!" Miryam's complaint might have been heard by some mysterious power, and she has come to the filthy land called Nord.
Gameplay: This is a highly variable strategic tower defense game. Follow Miryam and embark on an adventure journey in the filthy land together. Facing the evil spirits from all directions, try every means to fight your way out and bring the land back to a lively state. While Miryam is becoming tougher and stronger step by step, her inner self is also undergoing unpredictable changes.

short_description: Traverse the wasteland with Miryam. Use magic items to build defenses against evil spirits. It's a casual tower defense game of construction and resource balance. Characters grow via challenges, from timid to fearless and wild. The blend of building and defense makes it addictive and engaging
